short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autocompletion and smart suggestions for popular game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update v1.1: 
Added support for new address (https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html)
Improved Smart (target yellow) suggestion sorting

Features:
Autocomplete words on typing
Suggest possible answers based on current board state
Switch dictionaries or sorting on the fly with extension popup
Clear game data and restart current game

Uses 2 dictionaries: all acceptable words by game and smaller dictionary with correct answers only
Uses 3 sorting types: alphabetical, smart with position-based letter weights (target green) and smart with overall letter weights (target yellow)

All options are accessible with extension popup menu (click on extension icon)
